name: Resistor (JohnGabrielUK, D4yz, Joshua Lee)
description:
You play as a public enemy, pursued by a police force who answer to none but themselves, and must prove your innocence before you are caught to escape the clutches of "justice".

The city belongs to the officers, but those looking to evade the long arm of the law can find respite in the safehouses and sewers. After all, there is more than one way to go underground...

Credits

Developed and directed by John Gabriel
Art by Jerico Landry
Music & sound effects by Joshua Lee
Leaderboards powered by Silent Wolf

Resistor was made for the forty-fifth Godot Wild Jam.
The source code is available here, and the soundtrack can be found on Bandcamp and SoundCloud.
